rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has Execution Diagram

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Property that specifies whether a component is abstract or not.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is Concrete

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment:
Property used to link an execution artifact to its file name (independently of its URI).
Example: @prefix opmw: <http://www.opmw.org/ontology/> . @prefix opmv: <http://purl.org/net/opmv/ns#> .
<http://www.opmw.org/export/resource/WorkflowExecutionArtifact/DCF49186981194248009E24BAD6A6412> a opmv:Artifact, opmw:WorkflowExecutionArtifact. opmw:hasFileName "NTMParams_SMN_2010_03_14Z"^^xsd:string.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has File Name
overall Start Time
has Template Diagram
overall End Time
Workflow Execution Process
has Native System Template
uses
is Parameter of Template

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment:
Property used to annotate a workflow execution artifact with the size in bytes of its file.
Example @prefix opmw: <http://www.opmw.org/ontology/> . @prefix opmv: <http://purl.org/net/opmv/ns#> .
<http://www.opmw.org/export/resource/WorkflowExecutionArtifact/DCF49186981194248009E24BAD6A6412> a opmv:Artifact, opmw:WorkflowExecutionArtifact. opmw:hasLocation "68"^^xsd:int.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has Size
corresponds to Template Artifact

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment:
Property used to link an execution artifact to the physical location of its file in the server.
Example @prefix opmw: <http://www.opmw.org/ontology/> . @prefix opmv: <http://purl.org/net/opmv/ns#> .
<http://www.opmw.org/export/resource/WorkflowExecutionArtifact/DCF49186981194248009E24BAD6A6412> a opmv:Artifact, opmw:WorkflowExecutionArtifact. opmw:hasLocation "http://www.opmw.org/datasets/resource/1/148/NTMParams_SMN_2010_03_14Z"^^xsd:anyURI.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has Location
Workflow Execution Account
corresponds to Template

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: OPMW is an OPMV, PROV and P-plan extension to model the executions and definitions of scientific workflows.
rdf:Description.terms:description: OPMW is an OPMV, PROV and P-plan extension to model the executions and definitions of scientific workflows.
rdf:Description.terms:creator: http://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/members/DGarijo/#me
rdf:Description.dc:title: The OPMW ontology
rdf:Description.terms:creator: http://www.isi.edu/~gil/

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: created in Workflow System
Workflow Template
Parameter Variable

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment:
A workflow template artifact is part of a workflow template. It explains what kind of artifact is used or generated by the process template, along with possible restrictions that it may have.
There are two different types of workflow template artifacts: data variables and parameter variables.
